faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Houston

whatIs.question: What is Houston and how does it work?
whatIs.answer: Houston is your AI-powered marketing copilot that helps you plan, execute, and optimize your marketing. Tell Houston what you want to achieve, and he creates a plan with concrete to-dos. He's always there when you have questions.

credits.question: How does the credit system work?
credits.answer: Houston uses a flexible credit system. You get 50 free starter credits when you sign up. Basic chat messages are free, while premium features like Deep Analysis (3 credits), AI Insights (3 credits), or Strategy Analysis (8 credits) cost credits. With the Solo Plan (€9.99/month) you get 100 credits, with the Team Plan (€39.99/month) 500 credits monthly.

whoIsItFor.question: Who is Houston for?
whoIsItFor.answer: Houston is for everyone who needs to do marketing but doesn't have a marketing department: solo coaches, consultants, small agencies, local businesses, and startups. If you have little time and don't want your marketing to fall behind, Houston is for you.

security.question: Is my data secure with Houston?
security.answer: Yes! We take security seriously. Houston uses enterprise-grade encryption for all data transmission and storage. Your marketing data, strategies, and conversations are protected with industry-standard security measures. We're GDPR compliant and never share your data with third parties.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel your subscription (Solo or Team Plan) at any time with no questions asked. Your plan will remain active until the end of your billing period, and you can export all your data. No hidden fees or cancellation charges. Credit Boosters (one-time purchases) never expire.

technical.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use Houston?
technical.answer: Not at all! Houston is designed for marketers, not developers. The interface is intuitive and conversational – just chat with Houston like you would with a human marketing consultant. No coding, no complex setup, no technical jargon.
